This post is used to summarize some of the findings related to the association between neighborhood (ZAT) profiles and pedestrian collision in Bogotá. Note that indicator values are from GIS data.

```{r setup, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(ClustGeo)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(patchwork)
```
